class.name: PlatformSection
class.description: When the [PlatformGenerator] generates [Platform]s it does so in "sections". This node is the container class of the generated [Platform]s.

method.name: create_with_id
method.description: Creates a [PlatformSection] with a specific ID.

members.member: The [FallBoundary] that this [PlatformSection] tracks to determine when to despawn itself.
The Y coordinate of the top of the [PlatformSection], used to determine when it is below the [FallBoundary] and can be despawned.
